SEARCH

All Classes and Interfaces

Classes
Class
Description
DatabaseConnector
The DatabaseConnector class establishes a connection to a MySQL database via user input.
DatabaseManager
The DatabaseManager class handles all database operations for the Movie List.
LoginManager
The LoginManager class handles user login and registration for the Movie List app.
Main
The Main class is the starting point for the Movie List app.
MovieListGUI
The MovieListGUI class provides a JavaFX-based user interface that allows users to view, add, update, and delete their favorite movies.
MovieManager
The MovieManager class handles all operations related to a user's movie list, including adding, updating, deleting movies, and finding similarity scores between users.
User
Represents a user in the Movie List application.
UserGUI
The UserGUI class provides a JavaFX-based GUI for user login, sign-up, file loading, and interaction with user movie lists and movie match suggestions.
UserManager
The UserManager class handles operations like loading users from the database, adding and removing users, and managing in-memory storage of User objects.
